item.title: Commonwealth Ministries
item.description: ߷ Part of the state series of articles Commonwealth Ministries are departments headed by a Sorda. The portfolios within ministries are usually assigned to qualified Cabinet members. Ministries are assigned with aspects of government that are partially devolved to Constituents, and as such are much larger than Council Secretariats. Ministries of the Interior Parliament 🪙Ministry of Commerce 🚧Ministry of the Commons (coming soon) 🌐Ministry of the Commonwealth ⚔️Ministry of Defence 🌍Ministry of Foreign Affairs (coming soon) ⚙️Ministry of Industry (coming soon) 🌋Ministry of Landscape (coming soon) 🔌Ministry of Light & Water ⛏️Ministry of Syndicates & Chapels (coming soon) 🚃Ministry of Transport (coming soon)
item.content:encoded:
߷ Part of the state series of articles
Commonwealth Ministries are departments headed by a Sorda. The portfolios within ministries are usually assigned to qualified Cabinet members. Ministries are assigned with aspects of government that are partially devolved to Constituents, and as such are much larger than Council Secretariats.
Ministries of the Interior Parliament
  • 🪙Ministry of Commerce
  • 🚧Ministry of the Commons (coming soon)
  • 🌐Ministry of the Commonwealth
  • ⚔️Ministry of Defence
  • 🌍Ministry of Foreign Affairs (coming soon)
  • ⚙️Ministry of Industry (coming soon)
  • 🌋Ministry of Landscape (coming soon)
  • 🔌Ministry of Light & Water
  • ⛏️Ministry of Syndicates & Chapels (coming soon)
  • 🚃Ministry of Transport (coming soon)

item.title: Councils
item.description: ߷ Part of the state series of articles The Commonwealth councils, known as secretariats in Vekllei, are a superior kind of ministry headed by a secretary. Vekllei Ministries answer to the Commonwealth Parliament, whereas councils report directly to the Commonwealth Council. In practice, councils are federalised and so carry out their roles directly, unlike the devolved ministries.
item.content:encoded:
߷ Part of the state series of articles
The Commonwealth councils, known as secretariats in Vekllei, are a superior kind of ministry headed by a secretary. Vekllei Ministries answer to the Commonwealth Parliament, whereas councils report directly to the Commonwealth Council. In practice, councils are federalised and so carry out their roles directly, unlike the devolved ministries.

item.title: Crown
item.description: ߷ Part of the state series of articles The Commonwealth Parliament is the supranational governing body of the Vekllei Commonwealth and its member-states. Secretariats of the Commonwealth Parliament ⚖️Courts of the Crown (coming soon) 💼Fair Work Authority (coming soon) 🗳️Vekllei Democracy Commissariat (coming soon)
item.content:encoded:
߷ Part of the state series of articles
The Commonwealth Parliament is the supranational governing body of the Vekllei Commonwealth and its member-states.
Secretariats of the Commonwealth Parliament
  • ⚖️Courts of the Crown (coming soon)
  • 💼Fair Work Authority (coming soon)
  • 🗳️Vekllei Democracy Commissariat (coming soon)
